body_text: Unfortunately return and return undefined behave differently for eslint's "you must either never return something or always return something" rules, which I guess is why undefined was made explicit here.
body: Unfortunately `return` and `return undefined` behave differently for eslint's "you must either never return something or always return something" rules, which I guess is why `undefined` was made explicit here.
body_html: Unfortunately return and return undefined behave differently for eslint's "you must either never return something or always return something" rules, which I guess is why undefined was made explicit here.
